blogs.title: Why the Armored Titan Rocks
blogs.author: Reiner Braun
blogs.content: It's OP. It protects. It attacks. It smashes through titan's backs.

blogs.title: Why the Attack Titan Sucks
blogs.author: Reiner Braun
blogs.content: If we're being real, Eren is such an emo. All he does is scream about freedom. 'Tatakae'. 'Tatakae'. Please be quiet before I justify the killing of Eldians.

blogs.title: RIP Berutoruto
blogs.author: Reiner Braun
blogs.content: My comrade got eaten by that pipsqueak Armin Arlert. Why him. Why couldn't it be me... Just let me die already...

blogs.title: We need to Talk...
blogs.author: Reiner Braun
blogs.content: Eren Yaeger has gone too far. Yesterday, he showed up to Marley and proceeded to kill random, innocent people enjoying their day. Who shifts into their titan form and does a belly flop on people in stands? Of course, it was up to me to save the day. Again...
